lead_paragraph: Pakistan paceman Mohammad Amir, who spent time in jail and served a five-year ban for spot-fixing, will be able to handle the pressure of returning to England if he is granted a visa for their upcoming tour, said team mate Azhar Ali.

headline.print_headline: Pakistan's Azhar Backs Amir in England Return
headline.main: Pakistan's Azhar Backs Amir in England Return
